Verses: 1 piriyamaanavargale, Ulagaththil Anegan Kallaththeerkkadharisigal Thondriyiruppadhinaal, Neengal Ellaa Aavigalaiyum Nambaamal, Andha Aavigal Dhevanaalundaanavaigalo Endru Sodhiththariyungal.
2 dhevaaaviyai Neengal Edhinaale Ariyalaamendraal: Maamsaththil Vandha Yesukiristhuvai Arikkaipannugira Endha Aaviyum Dhevanaal Undaayirukkiradhu.

3 maamsaththil Vandha Yesukiristhuvai Arikkaipannaadha Endha Aaviyum Dhevanaal Undaanadhalla; Varumendru Neengal Kelvippatta Andhikkiristhuvinudaiya Aavi Adhuve, Adhu Ippozhudhum Ulagaththil Irukkiradhu.
4 pillaigale, Neengal Dhevanaalundaayirundhu, Avargalai Jeyiththeergal; Enenil Ulagaththilirukkiravanilum Ungalilirukkiravar Periyavar.
5 avargal Ulagaththukkuriyavargal,aagaiyaal Ulagaththukkuriyavaigalaip Pesugiraargal, Ulagamum Avargalukku Sevikodukkum.

6 naangal Dhevanaal Undaanavargal; Dhevanai Arindhavan Engalukku Sevikodukkiraan; Dhevanaal Undaayiraadhavan Engalukku Sevikodukkiradhillai; Idhinaale Saththiya Aavi Innadhendrum, Vanjagaaavi Innadhendrum Arindhirukkirom.
7 piriyamaanavargale, Oruvariloruvar Anbaayirukkakkadavom; Enenil Anbu Dhevanaal Undaayirukkiradhu; Anbulla Evanum Dhevanaal Pirandhu, Avarai Arindhirukkiraan.
8 anbillaadhavan Dhevanai Ariyaan, Dhevan Anbaagave Irukkiraar.
9 thammudaiya Ore Peraana Kumaaranaale Naam Pizhaikkumpadikku Dhevan Avarai Ivvulagaththile Anuppinadhinaal Dhevan Nammel Vaiththa Anbu Velippattadhu.

10 naam Dhevanidaththil Anbukoorndhadhinaal Alla, Avar Nammidaththil Anbukoorndhu, Nammudaiya Paavangalai Nivirththiseygira Kirubaadhaarabaliyaagath Thammudaiya Kumaaranai Anuppinadhinaale Anbu Undaayirukkiradhu.
11 piriyamaanavargale, Dhevan Ivvidhamaai Nammidaththil Anbukoorndhirukka, Naamum Oruvaridaththil Oruvar Anbukoorak Kadanaaligalaayirukkirom.
12 dhevanai Oruvarum Orupodhum Kandadhillai; Naam Oruvaridaththil Oruvar Anbukoorndhaal Dhevan Namakkul Nilaiththirukkiraar; Avarudaiya Anbum Namakkul Pooranappadum.
13 avar Thammudaiya Aaviyil Namakkuth Thandharulinadhinaale Naam Avarilum Avar Nammilum Nilaiththirukkiradhai Arindhirukkirom.
14 pidhaavaanavar Kumaaranai Ulagaratchakaraaga Anuppinaarendru Naangal Kandu Saatchiyidukirom.
15 yesuvaanavar Dhevanudaiya Kumaaranendru Arikkaipannugiravan Evano Avanil Dhevan Nilaiththirukkiraar, Avanum Dhevanil Nilaiththirukkiraan.
16 dhevan Nammel Vaiththirukkira Anbai Naam Arindhu Visuvaasiththirukkirom. Dhevan Anbaagave Irukkiraar; Anbil Nilaiththirukkiravan Dhevanil Nilaiththirukkiraan, Dhevanum Avanil Nilaiththirukkiraar.
17 niyaayaththeerppunaalile Namakkuth Dhairiyamundaayirukkaththakkadhaaga Anbu Nammidaththil Pooranappadugiradhu; Enendraal, Avar Irukkirapiragaaramaaga Naamum Ivvulagaththil Irukkirom.
18 anbile Bayamillai; Poorana Anbu Bayaththaip Purambe Thallum; Bayamaanadhu Vedhanaiyulladhu, Bayappadugiravan Anbil Pooranappattavan Alla.
19 avar Mundhi Nammidaththil Anbukoorndhapadiyaal Naamum Avaridaththil Anbukoorugirom.

20 dhevanidaththil Anbukoorugirenendru Oruvan Solliyum, Than Sagodharanaip Pagaiththaal, Avan Poiyan; Thaan Kanda Sagodharanidaththil Anbukooraamalirukkiravan, Thaan Kaanaadha Dhevanidaththil Eppadi Anbukooruvaan?
21 dhevanidaththil Anbukoorugiravan Than Sagodharanidaththilum Anbukooravendumengira Indhak Karpanaiyai Avaraale Petrirukkirom.
